item.description:
You suggested it, so we're trying it!

Dinner at Grace! This is a beautiful old church that has been converted into a restaurant. However, they are quite expensive, so please review the menu before RSVPing. You can do appetizers & dessert only for $15 or raise you bill as high as you can afford by ordering more items.

Here is their website where you can review the menu: http://www.restaurantgrace.com

Personally, I've scouted the menu and found the following delicious, semi-afforable options: 

Cocktail: HEATED AFFAIR/? - $10 estimate House Infused Strawberry-Jalapeno-Pineapple Tequila Margarita

Salad: WARM ESCAROLE SALAD /$8
Crispy Prosciutto/ Fingerling Potatoes/ Raclette Cheese/Shallot Vinaigrette

Entree: VEGAN MUSHROOM "MAC & PEAS" /$18
Cauliflower Puree/ Wild Mushrooms/ BlacK Truffle/ Snow Peas

OR

HANGER STEAK /$25
Macaroni & Cheese/ Sauteed Broccolini/ Mustard Beer Sauce

Dessert: COFFEE SEMI-FREDO /$7
Toasted Almond Anglaise/ Candied Almond/ Chocolate Sorbet/ Almond Biscotti

APPROXIMATE TOTAL FOR EVERYTHING (Mac & Peas): $43

APPROXIMATE TOTAL FOR EVERYTHING (Hanger Steak): $50

IF YOU ONLY GET APPETIZER & DESSERT: $15
item.name: Grace Restaurant
